Text: Hm... When i unpack this .rar file, i get that the arkiv is broken. Does everyone that, ore just me?
I'm a little suspicuos about an allegedly "full" game that's only 40 megs in size. :sly: Since every other torrented Risk 2 out there is roughly 200 megs in size I mean... :smartass:
